name: 2022 Russia Ukraine War
data_intro: This dataset describes Equipment Losses & Death Toll & Military Wounded & Prisoner of War of russians in 2022 Ukraine russia War.

cat_feature_intro.date: 1. Main data sources are [General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine](https://www.zsu.gov.ua/en) and [Ministry of Defence of Ukraine](https://www.mil.gov.ua/en/). Data from different battlefields are gathered. The calculation is complicated by the high intensity of hostilities. Data are being updated.

num_feature_intro.day: **Each new record is accumulated data from previous days**
num_feature_intro.drone: - [Massive Missile Attacks on Ukraine](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/piterfm/massive-missile-attacks-on-ukraine) - detailed information about launched and shot down missiles and drones during Massive Missile Attacks.
num_feature_intro.submarines: - [russian navy (Military Maritime Fleet)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/piterfm/russian-navy) - all Surface Combatants, Submarines, Littoral Warfare Ships, Rescue, and Auxiliary Ships. Ship losses During The 2022 Russian Invasion Of Ukraine are included.
num_feature_intro.personnel: - `russia_losses_personnel.csv`- contains Personnel Losses during the war
num_feature_intro.POW: 2. [Invaders](https://invaders-rf.com/) - Russians Prisoner of War (POW). The project is not active since May of 2022.
